property.name: createNewOrderSql
property.value: INSERT INTO orders (id, subtotal, tax, grandtotal) VALUES (:id, :subtotal, :tax, :grandtotal)

property.name: findOrderSql
property.value: SELECT id, orderno, subtotal, tax, grandtotal, timestamp FROM orders WHERE id = :id

property.name: findLineItemsSql
property.value: SELECT oli.order_id, oli.item_id, item.name, oli.qty, oli.price FROM order_line_item oli JOIN item item on (item.id = oli.item_id) WHERE order_id = :id

property.name: findTenderRecordsSql
property.value: SELECT order_id, amount, change_amt, timestamp FROM tender_record WHERE order_id = :id

property.name: insertLineItemSql
property.value: INSERT INTO order_line_item (order_id, item_id, qty, price) VALUES (:id, :item_id, :qty, :price)

property.name: updateOrderSql
property.value: UPDATE orders SET orderno = :orderno , subtotal = :subtotal , tax = :tax , grandtotal = :grandtotal WHERE id = :id

property.name: insertTenderRecordSql
property.value: INSERT INTO tender_record (order_id, amount, change_amt) VALUES (:orderId, :amount, :changeAmt)
